name: FreeFalling
description:
Hi! This is my first game I have ever made !

You can also find this at www.newgrounds.com but I have now uploaded it here!

Have fun and enjoy!

Game story:

You are a player who has been formed out of binary code, and is traveling through light portals trying to find your way.

You seem to have hints to a big part of the game!

You follow those hints to the end!

And you find out the rest!
